author: Emma Grey Ellis
title: For Homeless People, Covid-19 Is Horror on Top of Horror
description: As the coronavirus spreads, unhoused people are among the most vulnerable to infection.
content: There is nothing, a desperate poster writes, and a dozen others agree. Online communities dedicated to homelessness, like Reddits r/homeless, were already places to vent about unlivable living situations, but as the Covid-19 outbreak continues, the challenges… [+6014 chars]
